Config.name: calendarType
Config.description: Type of calendar to use for time.

Config.name: startTime
Config.description: Start time of the simulation.

Config.name: timeStep
Config.description: Length of thermodynamic time step in seconds.

Config.name: simulationStopType
Config.description: Method for determining the length of the simulation.

Config.name: stopTime
Config.description: Stop time of the simulation.

Config.name: nSteps
Config.description: Length of the simulation in number of time steps.

Config.name: simulationDuration
Config.description: Length of the simulation in time interval format.

Config.name: nDynamicsSubcycles
Config.description: Number of dynamics subcycles per thermodynamics time step

Config.name: doRestart
Config.description: If true start model from restart.

Config.name: useForcing
Config.description: Use the forcing system.

Config.name: useDynamics
Config.description: Use the dynamics.

Config.name: useExternalForces
Config.description: Use the external forces calculations.

Config.name: useColumn
Config.description: Use the column icepack.

Config.name: gridFile
Config.description: Name of NetCDF grid file.

Config.name: integrateMotion
Config.description: Have lammps integrate the equations of motion.

Config.name: useCoastlineElements
Config.description: Use fixed type 2 elements representing coastlines.

Config.name: skinFraction
Config.description: Fraction of largest initial particle diameter to set skin thickness to

Config.name: timestepThickness
Config.description: Scale density by this thickness in time step calculation.

Config.name: lostAtomsType
Config.description: What to do if atmos are lost from the domain.

Config.name: contactType
Config.description: Contact type.

Config.name: bondThickness
Config.description: Thickness of Hopkins bonds.

Config.name: elasticModulus
Config.description: elastic modulus for Hopkins contact.

Config.name: poissonRatio
Config.description: Poisson ratio.

Config.name: compressiveBreakingStressType
Config.description: Type of compressive breaking stress formulation.

Config.name: compressiveBreakingStress
Config.description: Compressive breaking stress limit.

Config.name: tensileBreakingStressType
Config.description: Type of tensile breaking stress formulation.

Config.name: tensileBreakingStress
Config.description: Tensile breaking stress limit.

Config.name: frictionAngle
Config.description: Friction angle.

Config.name: bondedDamping
Config.description: Bonded damping coefficient.

Config.name: tangentialFriction
Config.description: Tangential friction coefficient.

Config.name: nonbondedNormalDamping
Config.description: Nonbonded normal damping coefficient.

Config.name: nonbondedTangentialDamping
Config.description: Nonbonded tangential damping coefficient.

Config.name: criticalCrushingThickness
Config.description: Thickness for transition from ridge crushing to buckling.

Config.name: minimumIceThickness
Config.description: minimum ice thickness in dynamics

Config.name: minimumIceConcentration
Config.description: minimum ice concentration in dynamics

Config.name: particleInputFile
Config.description: Name of NetCDF particle input file.

Config.name: particleWriteFilenameTemplate
Config.description: Name of NetCDF particle output filename template.

Config.name: particleWriteOutputDirectory
Config.description: Name of NetCDF particle output directory.

Config.name: particleWriteInterval
Config.description: Interval for particle output.

Config.name: particleWriteClobber
Config.description: If true clobber particle output files.

Config.name: particleWriteBonds
Config.description: If true write bond info.

Config.name: griddedWriteFilenameTemplate
Config.description: Name of NetCDF particle output filename template.

Config.name: griddedWriteOutputDirectory
Config.description: Name of NetCDF particle output directory.

Config.name: griddedWriteInterval
Config.description: Interval for particle output.

Config.name: griddedWriteClobber
Config.description: If true clobber particle output files.

Config.name: tessellationWriteFilenameTemplate
Config.description: Name of NetCDF particle output filename template.

Config.name: tessellationWriteOutputDirectory
Config.description: Name of NetCDF particle output directory.

Config.name: tessellationWriteInterval
Config.description: Interval for particle output.

Config.name: tessellationWriteClobber
Config.description: If true clobber particle output files.

Config.name: writeLogAllProcs
Config.description: Write log files for all processors.

Config.name: writeLogDebug
Config.description: Write debug messages.

Config.name: forcingFilenameTemplate
Config.description: The forcing filename template.

Config.name: timeVaryingForcing
Config.description: If true forcing is time varying.

Config.name: forcingReferenceTime
Config.description: Reference time for forcing data reads.

Config.name: forcingInterval
Config.description: Time interval between forcing data.

Config.name: forcingFilenameTemplate
Config.description: The forcing filename template.

Config.name: timeVaryingForcing
Config.description: If true forcing is time varying.

Config.name: forcingReferenceTime
Config.description: Reference time for forcing data reads.

Config.name: forcingInterval
Config.description: Time interval between forcing data.

Config.name: forcingFilenameTemplate
Config.description: The forcing filename template.

Config.name: timeVaryingForcing
Config.description: If true forcing is time varying.

Config.name: forcingReferenceTime
Config.description: Reference time for forcing data reads.

Config.name: forcingInterval
Config.description: Time interval between forcing data.

Config.name: forcingFilenameTemplate
Config.description: The forcing filename template.

Config.name: timeVaryingForcing
Config.description: If true forcing is time varying.

Config.name: forcingReferenceTime
Config.description: Reference time for forcing data reads.

Config.name: forcingInterval
Config.description: Time interval between forcing data.

Config.name: useLimitTemperature
Config.description: Limit temperature to near freezing if ice present.

Config.name: useLimitHumidity
Config.description: Limit specific Humidity.

Config.name: useGetShortwaveFromCloudiness
Config.description: Calculate the downwelling shortwave radiation from the cloudiness.

Config.name: useSplitShortwave
Config.description: Split shortwave radiation between bands

Config.name: useApplyPhysicalLimits
Config.description: Apply physical limits to forcing variables.

Config.name: longwaveType
Config.description: Type of longwave calculation

Config.name: useSplitPrecipitation
Config.description: Split precipitation between rain and snow from temperature

Config.name: precipitationUnits
Config.description: scaling type for precipitation

Config.name: massInitType
Config.description: Method to read in mass variables.

Config.name: testColumnProcTransfer
Config.description: If true perform test on column communication.

Config.name: useAirStress
Config.description: If true calculate surface air stresses.

Config.name: useOceanStress
Config.description: If true calculate surface ocean stresses.

Config.name: useCoriolisForce
Config.description: If true calculate Coriolis forces.

Config.name: useSurfaceTiltForce
Config.description: If true calculate surface tilt forces.

Config.name: atmDensity
Config.description: Atmospheric air density for drag.

Config.name: ocnDensity
Config.description: Ocean water density for drag.

Config.name: windDragCoefficient
Config.description: Wind drag coefficient.

Config.name: oceanDragCoefficient
Config.description: Ocean drag coefficient.

Config.name: earthRotationRate
Config.description: Angular rotation rate of the Earth.

Config.name: useRemapping
Config.description: Use remapping system.

Config.name: remappingCorrectionType
Config.description: Use remapping system.

Config.name: remappingInterval
Config.description: Time intervale between remapping.

Config.name: checkConservation
Config.description: Check whether tracers are conserved during remapping.

Config.name: checkRemappingWeights
Config.description: Check remapping weights sum to one.

Config.name: checkEffectiveArea
Config.description: Check effective area is less than init area.

Config.name: checkIceConcentrationBounds
Config.description: Check ice concentration is bound [0,1].

Config.name: maxIceConcBoundError
Config.description: Allowed error for ice concentration bounds.

Config.name: nCategories
Config.description: The number of ice thickness categories.

Config.name: nIceLayers
Config.description: The number of vertical ice layers.

Config.name: nSnowLayers
Config.description: The number of vertical snow layers.

Config.name: nAerosols
Config.description: The number of aerosol types.

Config.name: useColumnShortwave
Config.description: Use the shortwave radiation with the column physics

Config.name: useColumnVerticalThermodynamics
Config.description: Use the vertical thermodynamics with the column physics

Config.name: useColumnItdThermodynamics
Config.description: Use the itd thermodynamics with the column physics

Config.name: useColumnRidging
Config.description: Use the ridging with the column physics

Config.name: useIceAge
Config.description: If true use the ice age tracer.

Config.name: useFirstYearIce
Config.description: If true use the first year ice tracer.

Config.name: useLevelIce
Config.description: If true use the level ice tracers.

Config.name: useCesmMeltponds
Config.description: If true use the cesm meltponds tracers.

Config.name: useLevelMeltponds
Config.description: If true use the level ice meltponds tracers.

Config.name: useTopoMeltponds
Config.description: If true use the topo meltpond tracers.

Config.name: useAerosols
Config.description: Carry aerosols in the ice (NCAR scheme)

Config.name: shortwaveType
Config.description: Shortwave radiation method.

Config.name: albedoType
Config.description: Albedo parameterization type.

Config.name: visibleIceAlbedo
Config.description: Visible ice albedo for ice thickness greater than config_variable_albedo_thickness_limit.

Config.name: infraredIceAlbedo
Config.description: Near-IR ice albedo for ice thickness greater than config_variable_albedo_thickness_limit.

Config.name: visibleSnowAlbedo
Config.description: Visible cold snow albedo.

Config.name: infraredSnowAlbedo
Config.description: Near-IR cold snow albedo.

Config.name: variableAlbedoThicknessLimit
Config.description: Ice thickness above which the ice albedo is constant.

Config.name: iceShortwaveTuningParameter
Config.description: Sea ice tuning parameter; +1 for 1sig increase in albedo.

Config.name: pondShortwaveTuningParameter
Config.description: Ponded ice tuning parameter; +1 for 1sig increase in albedo.

Config.name: snowShortwaveTuningParameter
Config.description: Snow tuning parameter; +1 for ~.01 change in broadband albedo.

Config.name: tempChangeSnowGrainRadiusChange
Config.description: Change in temperture for non-melt to melt snow grain radius change.

Config.name: maxMeltingSnowGrainRadius
Config.description: Maximum melting snow grain radius.

Config.name: algaeAbsorptionCoefficient
Config.description: Algae absorption coefficient for 0.5 m thick layer.

Config.name: snowToIceTransitionDepth
Config.description: Snow depth for transition to bare sea ice.

Config.name: pondRefreezingType
Config.description: Pond refreezing parameterization.

Config.name: pondFlushingTimescale
Config.description: Alter e-folding time scale for flushing.?????

Config.name: minMeltwaterRetainedFraction
Config.description: Minimum retained fraction of meltwater.

Config.name: maxMeltwaterRetainedFraction
Config.description: Maximum retained fraction of meltwater.

Config.name: pondDepthToFractionRatio
Config.description: Ratio of pond depth to pond fraction.

Config.name: snowOnPondIceTaperingParameter
Config.description: Tapering parameter for snow on pond ice.

Config.name: criticalPondIceThickness
Config.description: Critical parameter for pond ice thickness.

Config.name: thermodynamicsType
Config.description: Vertical themodynamics type.

Config.name: heatConductivityType
Config.description: Thermal conductivity type for BL99 thermodynamics. Options are Maykut and Untersteiner 1971 form (with Wettlaufer 1991 constants), or Pringle et al JGR 2007 'bubbly brine'

Config.name: rapidModeChannelRadius
Config.description: Channel radius for rapid gravity drainage mode.

Config.name: rapidModelCriticalRa
Config.description: Critical Rayleigh number for rapid gravity drainage mode.

Config.name: rapidModeAspectRatio
Config.description: Aspect ratio for rapid gravity drainage mode (larger=wider).

Config.name: slowModeDrainageStrength
Config.description: Slow gravity drainage mode drainage strength.

Config.name: slowModeCriticalPorosity
Config.description: Liquid fraction porosity cutoff for slow gravity drainage mode.

Config.name: congelationIcePorosity
Config.description: Liquid fraction of congelation ice.

Config.name: itdConversionType
Config.description: Type of ice thickness distribution conversions.

Config.name: categoryBoundsType
Config.description: Type of ice thickness category bounds.

Config.name: iceStrengthFormulation
Config.description: Type of ice strength formulation.

Config.name: ridgingParticipationFunction
Config.description: Type of ridging participation function.

Config.name: ridgingRedistributionFunction
Config.description: Type of ridging redistribution function.

Config.name: ridigingEfoldingScale
Config.description: E-folding scale of ridged ice (krdg_redist = 1)

Config.name: ratioRidgingWorkToPE
Config.description: Ratio of ridging work to PE change in ridging (kstrength = 1)

Config.name: atmosBoundaryMethod
Config.description: Atmosphere boundary method.

Config.name: calcSurfaceStresses
Config.description: If true calculate wind stress components.

Config.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
Config.description: If true calculate surface temperature. If false surface temperature is computed elsewhere and atmos-ice fluxes are provided.

Config.name: useFormDrag
Config.description: If true calculate form drag.

Config.name: useHighFrequencyCoupling
Config.description: If true use high frequency coupling.

Config.name: boundaryLayerIterationNumber
Config.description: Number of iterations for boundary layer calculations

Config.name: oceanType
Config.description: Type of ocean used.

Config.name: useOceanMixedLayer
Config.description: If true use an ocean mixed layer.

Config.name: minFrictionVelocity
Config.description: Minimum friction velocity for ice-ocean heat flux.

Config.name: oceanHeatTransferType
Config.description: Transfer coefficient type for ice-ocean heat flux.

Config.name: seaFreezingTemperatureType
Config.description: Form of ocean freezing temperature.
